about_the_game:
Rule the galaxy or die trying!

You were never meant to be the heir. You were the second child, the pampered princess, busy with your friends and your pet and your collection of beautiful shoes. But then your mother died, your brother the Prince turned traitor, and your father the Emperor disappeared under mysterious circumstances. Now it's up to you to win the Imperial Election and claim the throne.

Set in the universe of previous title Long Live The Queen, Galaxy Princess Zorana carries on the tradition of strategic life-simulation in a deadly game of court intrigue.

Choose Your Strengths

Every turn, you can choose different skills for Zorana to study, transforming her from an unprepared princess into a master of etiquette or swordfighting or lock-picking or spaceflight.

The skills you prioritise each playthrough will open up different possibilities for responding to story events. Danger is always brewing in the Celestial Empire, and every turn some situation will arise that requires Zorana to make decisions: 

Attempting a lockdown without sufficient Military skill might backfire and make the Imperial Fleet rebel against you!

Keep Your Friends Close (And Your Enemies Closer)

To become Empress, you must win over a majority of the thirty Electors scattered around the Empire.

Travel to their locations and try to earn their favor by making political promises, carrying out quests, offering them positions in your cabinet, or even promising marriage. Every Elector has their own allies and enemies, so you must choose strategically which characters to court and which to ignore. Supporting one faction may make another turn against you.

Keep your eyes open - your fellow nobles are backstabbing schemers who wouldn't hesitate to assassinate an adolescent girl for their own benefit. Choose wisely.

Choice And Consequence

With dozens of skills to learn and hundreds of branching paths to follow, there is always another secret waiting to be uncovered. Your choices will shape Zorana's character and, through her, the future of the Celestial Empire.

Will you rule with an iron fist, or try to bring the Empire to a kindler, gentler tomorrow? Will your legacy shine brightly, or will you fail to win the Election and be wiped off the historical record? Will you even survive long enough to try?

LONG LIVE IMPERIAL PRINCESS ZORANA

  • Strategic map - travel around the Empire to claim votes and territory

  • Colorful aliens - dark elves, cat people, mushroom monsters, and many more

  • Dozens of characters - choose where to make alliances to shift the balance of power

  • Royal fashion - over a dozen outfits to unlock

  • Branching story - many ways to win and even more ways to die!

content_descriptors.notes: Text-only description of violence, sometimes leading to death. Cute chibi death graphics. Alcohol use, fantastical drug use. Mild suggestive jokes/references. Many complex topics are discussed within the context of this setting's politics, including arranged marriages, cloning, and ritual suicide as a cultural expectation within the Empire.

name: Galaxy Princess Zorana

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: You are the Evil Emperor's only daughter, but can you claim the throne? Raise stats, make deals, appoint advisors, and scheme your way through the Imperial Election - unless an assassin gets you first. Rule the galaxy or die trying!
